channel.title: Router/No-ip Help!(registering server)
channel.description: Idk if its my router or my no-ip but when i try to register my server on the status check, it claims my server is offline?!?!?!?!?!?!?? Under My router(linksys) this is what i put under applications and gaming: Application:Rsprivateserver Start:43594 End: 43594 Protocol:TCP Ip address 192.168.1.3<----(i think thts where i went wrong but idk). On no-ip i made an account and did this:Hostname: monkeymadeaids.no-ip.biz.....then i left how it was and clicked create host. After that i opened my no-ip DUC and refreshed the host list then clicked the check box and the face next to monkeymadeaids.no-ip.biz turned into a blushing smiley face(LOL) plz help idk what to do :confused:!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:.....................PLZ??!?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!??

item.title: Router/No-ip Help!(registering server)
item.dc:creator: @masseve1 masseve1
item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

Jw…wats a dedi[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2009, 08:38:23 pm[/size][hr]Ok i found out what i did wrong… i thot when i put in my ip address for portforwarding, you were supposed to put in any ip address…hahahahahahahaha so i fixed and works now:ty for helping!!

Read full topic

item.title: Router/No-ip Help!(registering server)
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

its different with linksys i had trouble with it also you are going to have to buy a dedi if you want it to work linksys sometimes doesnt allow you to portforward those ports

item.title: Router/No-ip Help!(registering server)

item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

Idk if its my router or my no-ip but when i try to register my server on the status check, it claims my server is offline?!?!?!?!?!?!??
Under My router(linksys) this is what i put under applications and gaming: Application:Rsprivateserver Start:43594 End: 43594 Protocol:TCP Ip address 192.168.1.3<----(i think thts where i went wrong but idk). On no-ip i made an account and did this:Hostname: monkeymadeaids.no-ip.biz…then i left how it was and clicked create host. After that i opened my no-ip DUC and refreshed the host list then clicked the check box and the face next to monkeymadeaids.no-ip.biz turned into a blushing smiley face(LOL) plz help idk what to do !!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:…PLZ???
